description: These other action emotes are making peace signs. There’s even an actual peace sign character ✌! Go ahead and take advantage of that as it adds in a nice splash of colour. There are other options too, so take a look at the list below to pick out your favourite style.  ✌⎦ʘ_ゝʘ⎣✌ v(｡-_-｡)v ✌（◕ω◕）✌ ✌_‹(⊂•⊃¿⊂•⊃)›_✌ ✌(꒡͡ ો ̼̮ ꒡͡✌) ✌( ་ེིོཻྀཽཾ⌓ ་ེིོཻྀཽཾ)
title: Peace Signs
